past_present_future_me.webp.title: Past Me, Present Me, Future Me
past_present_future_me.webp.alt: A claymation style image of 3 versions of a black man. The left most being the youngest, past version, the middle being the middle aged, present, version of the character and the right most being the eldest version of the character.
